attributes.action: Re-introduce MIRAS, Exempt Stamp Duty, Guarantee Mortgage for first-time homebuyers whose income is less than £25,000 pa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First-time homebuyers should be encouraged, not deterred, to buy their homes. To assist, MIRAS should be re-introduced, Stamp Duty should be abolished, and Mortgages should be guaranteed for all first time homebuyers whose income is less than £25,000 pa.
